content:
We continue marching against the impunity of yesterday and today, we denounce the repression of this fascist government of Milei and its hunger and delivery policy.

Let's reaffirm are 30 thousand! It was genocide!

San Martín Plaza - Quilmes

Permanent Tribute Commission to the Mothers of Plaza de Mayo de Quilmes.

Today N ° 1999 02/21/2024
title: Round of the Mothers of Plaza de Mayo de Quilmes
description: We continue marching against the impunity of yesterday and today, we denounce the repression of this fascist government of Milei and its hunger and delivery policy. Let's reaffirm are 30 thousand! It was genocide! SAN MARTÍN PLAZA - QUILMES PERMANENT COMMISSION OF TRIBUTE TO THE Mothers of Plaza de Mayo de Quilmes. Today N ° 1999 21/02/2024 ...
author: carga
